about_the_game:
Exploring the Ruins of a Fallen Empire…


In a world where empires rise and fall, step into the shoes of an intrepid adventurer as you unravel the enigmatic history hidden within the ruins of a once-mighty civilization..…

Venture into the heart of darkness and discover the untold stories of a civilization long lost to the annals of time, as you brave the dangers lurking within the ruins of a fallen empire. Ensnared by the convoluted web spun by a dangerous criminal syndicate hailing from a distant land, you uncover a horrifying secret. Will you yield to their manipulation or rise up to fight for what’s right?

Explore a rich tapestry of weaponry and items, each imbued with its own unique attributes and abilities, allowing you to tailor your arsenal to confront any challenge that crosses your path.

Embark on a journey through a land ripe with opportunity, where a diverse skill system allows you to tailor your character’s abilities to match your playstyle, ensuring a truly personalized adventure. Explore expansive maps and seek out long-lost relics, slumbering quietly with time.


Game Features


Stylish combat with over-the-top exhilarating combos.
Explore a giant interconnected world riddled with monsters and machines.
Discover new abilities and upgrades, each further expanding the limits of exploration in the world.
Equip and customize rune arrangements with an interconnected system allowing for a wide array of personalized configurations.
More than 50 unique enemies!
More than 12 unique boss encounters!
A deep and compelling story, delivered in souls-like fashion.
Challenging AI to really keep you on your toes!
Unique side quests for those keen on deep-diving into the lore!
3D anime animation style.
Exceptional sonic journey.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 12th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-12100F 3.30 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 470 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: SSD (Preferred), HDD (Supported), 720p/30 fps, Low Quality Settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.2Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (3.6 Ghz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT or INTEL Arc A770
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: SSD, 1080p/60 fps, High Quality Settings
